mapper.select: SELECT mm.* FROM M_MEMBER_IMAGE mm,(SELECT MAX(m.CREATION_DATE) AS CREATION_DATE FROM M_MEMBER_IMAGE m WHERE m.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND m.STATE = 0 )as temp WHERE mm.CREATION_DATE =temp.CREATION_DATE AND mm.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} AND mm.STATE = 0
mapper.update: update M_MEMBER_IMAGE set VERSION=#{newvison},STATE=0 where VERSION=#{oldvison} and MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM M_MEMBER_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE=#{imageId} AND STATE=1

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(C.CERTIFICATE_NAME) from M_CERTIFICATE C LEFT JOIN M_CERTIFICATE_LEVEL L ON C.ID=L.`LEVEL` LEFT JOIN M_MEMBER_IMAGE M ON M.IMAGE=L.IMAGE_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND M.STATE=1
